title: Retro futuristic / hi-tech font?
content:
I'm looking for retro futuristic/hi-tech fonts. Think the IBM logo and Tron.  
Any suggestions?

Thanks!
author: dontbugme

comments.content: The IBM logo is set in [City medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20141030072248/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/city-bq/medium/)
You might also want to have a look at [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20141030072248/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15941)
